plot: Seasoned assassin Chloe, nicknamed 'Killer heels' by the agency, is the right hand woman to the notorious London crime boss Big Ben. Chloe's world changes when she is ordered to kill Daniel...
title: Killer Heels
plot_es: Seasoned assassin Chloe, nicknamed 'Killer heels' by the agency, is the right hand woman to the notorious London crime boss Big Ben. Chloe's world changes when she is ordered to kill Daniel...
